result.execSummary:
The defendant Conrado Garza was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.

Provide a DNA sample at the jail before release

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Conrado Garza

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court advises party of their rights, finds factual basis, accepts defendant's waiver of their rights, the plea made, and finds guilty. Defendant Conrado Garza appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Scott E. Niemi appeared for State of Wisconsin.

Defendant Conrado Garza in court, in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bond was set yesterday.  Defendant was given an offer but wanted to talk it over with his probation agent.  Hasn't been able to.  Judge gives defendant right to an attorney, defendant is undecided if he should get one.  He is not public defender eligible, so he would have to hire his own.  Judge will postpone this for a couple of days.  Schedule a status for 1pm on Friday.  Status conference scheduled for May 29, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
absolute sobriety, no possession of any illegal drugs
Defendant Conrado Garza appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Catharine Denise White appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 27, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
